fields.name: pollingInterval
fields.description: interval in milliseconds to poll audio content (default: 1 hour)

fields.name: emailAddress
fields.description: email address to send the meeting summary to

fields.name: emailPassword
fields.description: app specific password for your gmail account, https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en

fields.name: aiApiUrl
fields.description: ai api url, can be ollama, openai, any openai compatible api, for openai use https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions

fields.name: customSummaryPrompt
fields.default: summarize the following meeting transcript, there might be multiple meeting in the transcript, make sure to properly separate them, focusing on key points, action items, and decisions made:
fields.description: custom prompt for summarizing the meeting
